name: Small Messenger Bag Purse in Grey and Orange Floral
description:
Small messenger bag purse in light grey, orange floral flap, and stripe denim back. One of a kind. Ready to ship. 

Free shipping in U.S and Canada. 
$5 for international orders.

Small messenger purse features vintage brass button, interior patch pocket, snap closure, and long strap that can be worn across the body or on the shoulder. Padded straps, fully lined in contrasting orange fabric. 

Dimensions: 
9.5" (24.1 cm) high x 10" (24.5 cm) wide
20" (50.8 cm) straps
2" (5.1 cm) x 4.5" (11.4 cm) interior pocket

Upcycled cotton, cotton blend, polyester, and denim materials, vintage button. One of a kind!

Note: Colors may appear slightly different due to differences in monitors. 

Handmade with love in Iowa, USA. 

For more pictures, see here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/98283014/small-messenger-bag-purse-in-grey-and?ref=shop_home_active

name: Hand Dyed Mini Backpack Rucksack in Pink Green and Blue
description:
Mini drawstring backpack that was hand dyed in blue, pink, and green pastel colors. Upcycled leather flap. Each one is one of a kind. Very 80's! Ready to ship. 

Hand dyed mini backpack, each piece is unique and varied in dye pattern.

Free Shipping in U.S. and Canada!
$9 for international orders.

Mini bag features outside zippered pouch, interior patch pocket, snap closure, and drawstring stay. Recycled leather flap closure. Complimentary blue-green straps. Unlined. 

Dimensions:
11" (27.9) wide x 13" (33 cm) high x x 3" (7.6 cm) deep
7" (17.8 cm) x 3" (7.6 cm) cinched in bottom
28" (71.1 cm) straps
4.5" (11.4 cm) x 6" (15.2 cm) exterior pocket
approx. 5.5" (14 cm) x 5.5" (14 cm) interior pocket

Upcycled cotton canvas and leather materials, upcycled zipper. The zipper color will be different from pictured! One of a kind!

Note: Colors may appear slightly different due to differences in monitors. 

*See more detailed pictures here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/157035770/mini-backpack-drawstring-bag-hand-dyed

**See more bags here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/blissjoybull?section_id=6262929

Handmade with love in Iowa by BlissJoyBull. Thanks for looking!

name: Hand Painted Leather Coin Purse in Teal & Gold
description:
Reclaimed teal leather upcycled into a small coin purse. Hand painted chevron painted in gold. Great size for cards, cash, and a small phone, or some loose change. Could be used as a small wallet to fit inside a hand held clutch. Ready to ship.

Raw suede. Beautiful blue green color with gold paint. Small snap closure. 

Free shipping in U.S and Canada. 
$5 for international orders.

Dimensions:
3" (7.6 cm) by 4.5" (11.4 cm) (slightly larger than a credit card)

Handmade with love in Iowa, USA. 

For more pictures, see here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/121107121/teal-gold-leather-hand-painted-coin?ref=shop_home_feat
